name: Box Bro
description:
Join Box Bro on his quest to defeat the evil Orb Xob! Weave through bullets and obstacles, or face your imminent doom, unless dying is your thing.

________________________________________________________________________________

v.1.0

First working version of the game. A high score system/game over screen are next on the list of things to implement. Perhaps more boss battles to come in the future. Any criticisms/suggestions are welcomed.
